context.p: To redo an undone operation, do the following:

step.cmd: Call up the list of recent undone operations.

info.p: To call up the list of recent undone operations, choose Edit Redo .

stepresult.p: The list of recent undone operations will appear. The most recent undone operations come first on the list.

fig.title: The list of recent undone operations you can redo.

info.p: On the list, click the operation to redo.
When you redo an operation, you also redo all the operations above it on the list.

note.p:
You can also redo the very last undone operation one of these ways:
Click the Redo button on the toolbar.
Press Ctrl-Y.
